statement: CREATE TABLE t1 (a INT, b VARCHAR(32));

CREATE PROCEDURE p1 AS CURSOR c IS SELECT a,b FROM t1; BEGIN DECLARE rec c%ROWTYPE; BEGIN OPEN c; LOOP FETCH c INTO rec; EXIT WHEN c%NOTFOUND; SELECT 'rec=(' || rec.a ||','|| rec.b||')' AS c FROM dual; INSERT INTO t2 VALUES (rec.a, rec.b); END LOOP; CLOSE c; END; END;
CREATE PROCEDURE p1() AS CURSOR cur IS SELECT * FROM tes2.t1; BEGIN DECLARE rec cur%ROWTYPE; BEGIN NULL; END; END;
CREATE TABLE t1 (a INT, b VARCHAR(10), c DOUBLE, d DECIMAL(10));
CREATE PROCEDURE p1() AS CURSOR cur IS SELECT * FROM t1; BEGIN DECLARE rec cur%ROWTYPE; BEGIN CREATE TABLE t2 AS SELECT rec.a, rec.b, rec.c, rec.d; SHOW CREATE TABLE t2; DROP TABLE t2; END; END;

CREATE TABLE t1 (a INT, b VARCHAR(10));

CREATE PROCEDURE p1() AS CURSOR cur1 IS SELECT * FROM t1; CURSOR cur2 IS SELECT * FROM t2; BEGIN DECLARE rec1 cur1%ROWTYPE; rec2 cur2%ROWTYPE; BEGIN rec1:=rec2; END; END;

CREATE PROCEDURE p1() AS CURSOR cur1 IS SELECT * FROM t1; CURSOR cur2 IS SELECT * FROM t2; BEGIN DECLARE rec1 cur1%ROWTYPE; rec2 cur2%ROWTYPE; BEGIN rec1.a:= 10; rec1.b:= 'bbb'; rec2:=rec1; SELECT rec2.x, rec2.y; END; END;
CREATE TABLE t1 (a INT, b VARCHAR(10));
CREATE PROCEDURE p1() AS CURSOR cur1 IS SELECT * FROM t1; BEGIN DECLARE rec1 cur1%ROWTYPE; rec2 ROW(x INT,y INT,z INT); BEGIN rec2.x:= 10; rec2.y:= 20; rec2.z:= 30; rec1:= rec2; END; END;
CREATE TABLE t1 (a INT, b VARCHAR(10));

CREATE PROCEDURE p1() AS CURSOR cur1 IS SELECT * FROM t1; BEGIN DECLARE rec1 cur1%ROWTYPE; rec2 ROW(x INT,y INT); BEGIN rec2.x:= 10; rec2.y:= 20; rec1:= rec2; SELECT rec1.a, rec1.b; rec1.a:= 11; rec1.b:= 21; rec2:= rec1; SELECT rec2.x, rec2.y; END; END;

CREATE PROCEDURE p1() AS CURSOR cur IS SELECT * FROM t1; BEGIN DECLARE rec cur%ROWTYPE; BEGIN OPEN cur; LOOP FETCH cur INTO rec; EXIT WHEN cur%NOTFOUND; SELECT rec.a, rec.b, rec.c, rec.d; INSERT INTO t2 VALUES (rec.a, rec.b, rec.c, rec.d); END LOOP; CLOSE cur; END; END;

CREATE PROCEDURE p1() AS CURSOR cur IS SELECT * FROM t1; BEGIN OPEN cur; LOOP DECLARE rec cur%ROWTYPE; BEGIN FETCH cur INTO rec; EXIT WHEN cur%NOTFOUND; SELECT rec.a, rec.b, rec.c, rec.d; INSERT INTO t2 VALUES (rec.a, rec.b, rec.c, rec.d); END; END LOOP; CLOSE cur; END;

CREATE TABLE t1 (a INT, b VARCHAR(10));
CREATE TABLE t2 (a INT, b INT);

CREATE PROCEDURE p1() AS CURSOR cur1 IS SELECT * FROM t1; CURSOR cur2 IS SELECT * FROM t2; BEGIN DECLARE rec2 cur2%ROWTYPE; BEGIN OPEN cur1; FETCH cur1 INTO rec2; SELECT rec2.a, rec2.b; CLOSE cur1; END; END;
CREATE TABLE t1 (a INT, b INT);
CREATE TABLE t1 (a INT, b VARCHAR(10));
CREATE PROCEDURE p1(a OUT INT,b OUT VARCHAR(10)) AS BEGIN a:=10; b:='bb'; END;
CREATE PROCEDURE p2() AS CURSOR cur1 IS SELECT * FROM t1; BEGIN DECLARE rec1 cur1%ROWTYPE; BEGIN CALL p1(rec1.a, rec1.b); SELECT rec1.a, rec1.b; END; END;
CREATE TABLE t1 (a INT, b VARCHAR(10));
CREATE PROCEDURE p1(a ROW(a INT, b VARCHAR(10))) AS BEGIN SELECT a.a, a.b; END;
CREATE PROCEDURE p2() AS CURSOR cur IS SELECT * FROM t1; BEGIN DECLARE rec1 cur%ROWTYPE:= ROW(10,'bb'); BEGIN CALL p1(rec1); END; END;
CREATE TABLE t1 (a INT, b VARCHAR(10));
CREATE PROCEDURE p1(a OUT ROW(a INT, b VARCHAR(10))) AS BEGIN a:= ROW(10,'bb'); END;
CREATE PROCEDURE p2() AS CURSOR cur IS SELECT * FROM t1; BEGIN DECLARE rec1 cur%ROWTYPE; BEGIN CALL p1(rec1); SELECT rec1.a, rec1.b; END; END;
CREATE PROCEDURE p1 (res IN OUT INTEGER) AS a INT:=10; CURSOR cur1 IS SELECT a FROM DUAL; BEGIN DECLARE rec1 cur1%ROWTYPE; BEGIN OPEN cur1; FETCH cur1 INTO rec1; CLOSE cur1; res:=rec1.a; END; END;
CREATE TABLE t1 (a INT, b VARCHAR(10));
CREATE PROCEDURE p1 AS CURSOR cur1 IS SELECT * FROM t1; BEGIN DECLARE rec cur1%ROWTYPE:=ROW(10,'bb'); BEGIN EXPLAIN EXTENDED SELECT rec.a, rec.b; END; END;

CREATE PROCEDURE p1 AS CURSOR cur1 IS SELECT 10 AS a, CONCAT(_latin1'a' COLLATE latin1_bin, _latin1'a' COLLATE latin1_swedish_ci) AS b; BEGIN DECLARE rec1 cur1%ROWTYPE; BEGIN OPEN cur1; FETCH cur1 INTO rec1; CLOSE cur1; SELECT a,b; END; END;

CREATE PROCEDURE p1 AS CURSOR cur1 IS SELECT * FROM t1; BEGIN DECLARE rec cur1%ROWTYPE; BEGIN SELECT rec.c; END; END;

CREATE PROCEDURE p1 AS CURSOR cur IS SELECT * FROM t1; BEGIN DECLARE rec cur%ROWTYPE:=ROW(10,'bb'); BEGIN SELECT rec.A, rec.B; END; END;
CREATE TABLE t1 (a INT, b VARCHAR(32));
CREATE PROCEDURE p1 AS CURSOR cur IS SELECT * FROM t1; BEGIN DROP TABLE t1; CREATE TABLE t1 (a INT, b VARCHAR(32), c INT); DECLARE rec cur%ROWTYPE; BEGIN rec.c:=10; END; END;
CREATE TABLE t1 (a INT, b VARCHAR(32));
CREATE PROCEDURE p1 AS CURSOR cur IS SELECT * FROM t1; BEGIN DECLARE rec cur%ROWTYPE; BEGIN DROP TABLE t1; CREATE TABLE t1 (a INT, b VARCHAR(32), c INT); rec.c:=10; END; END;
CREATE PROCEDURE p1 AS CURSOR cur IS SELECT * FROM t1, t2; BEGIN DECLARE rec cur%ROWTYPE; BEGIN SELECT rec.a; rec.a:=10; END; END;

CREATE PROCEDURE p1 AS CURSOR cur IS SELECT a, CONCAT(a,'a'), CONCAT(a,'') FROM t1; BEGIN DECLARE rec cur%ROWTYPE; BEGIN OPEN cur; FETCH cur INTO rec; CLOSE cur; SELECT rec.a, rec.CONCAT(a,'a'), rec.CONCAT(a,''); END; END;
CREATE TABLE t1 (a INT, b VARCHAR(10));

CREATE PROCEDURE p1 AS CURSOR cur1 IS SELECT a,b FROM t1; BEGIN DECLARE rec1 cur1%ROWTYPE:=ROW(0,'b0'); CURSOR cur2 IS SELECT rec1.a AS a, rec1.b AS b FROM t1; BEGIN DECLARE rec2 cur2%ROWTYPE; BEGIN OPEN cur2; LOOP FETCH cur2 INTO rec2; EXIT WHEN cur2%NOTFOUND; SELECT rec2.a, rec2.b; END LOOP; CLOSE cur2; END; END; END;
CREATE TABLE t1 (a VARCHAR(10) CHARACTER SET latin1, b VARCHAR(10) CHARACTER SET utf8);
CREATE PROCEDURE p1 AS CURSOR cur1 IS SELECT CONCAT(a,b) AS c FROM t1; BEGIN DECLARE rec1 cur1%ROWTYPE; BEGIN OPEN cur1; FETCH cur1 INTO rec1; CLOSE cur1; SELECT HEX(rec1.c); END; END;
CREATE TABLE t1 (a INT, b VARCHAR(10));
CREATE PROCEDURE p1 AS rec INT:=10; CURSOR c1 IS SELECT a,b FROM t1; BEGIN FOR rec IN c1 LOOP SELECT rec.a; END LOOP; SELECT rec; END;
CREATE PROCEDURE p1 AS CURSOR cur IS SELECT 'a' AS a, 'A' as a; BEGIN FOR rec IN cur LOOP NULL; END LOOP; END;
CREATE TABLE t1 (a INT, b VARCHAR(10));

CREATE PROCEDURE p1 AS CURSOR cur IS SELECT a, b FROM t1; BEGIN FOR rec IN cur LOOP SELECT rec.a, rec.b; INSERT INTO t2 VALUES (rec.a, rec.b); rec.a:= rec.a + 1000; rec.b:= 'b' || rec.b; INSERT INTO t3 VALUES (rec.a, rec.b); END LOOP; END;
CREATE TABLE t1 (a INT, b VARCHAR(32));
CREATE PROCEDURE p1(pa INT, pb VARCHAR(32)) AS CURSOR cur(va INT, vb VARCHAR(32)) IS SELECT a, b FROM t1 WHERE a=va AND b=vb; BEGIN FOR rec IN cur(pa,pb) LOOP SELECT rec.a, rec.b; END LOOP; END;
CREATE PROCEDURE p1 AS BEGIN FOR rec IN (SELECT rec) LOOP NULL; END LOOP; END;
CREATE PROCEDURE p1 AS BEGIN FOR rec IN (SELECT rec.a) LOOP NULL; END LOOP; END;
CREATE PROCEDURE p1 AS BEGIN FOR rec IN (SELECT rec FROM rec) LOOP SELECT rec.rec; END LOOP; END;
CREATE PROCEDURE p1 AS BEGIN FOR rec IN (SELECT 'a' AS a, 'A' as a) LOOP NULL; END LOOP; END;
CREATE TABLE t1 (a INT, b VARCHAR(10));

CREATE PROCEDURE p1 AS BEGIN FOR rec IN (SELECT a, b FROM t1) LOOP SELECT rec.a, rec.b; INSERT INTO t2 VALUES (rec.a, rec.b); rec.a:= rec.a + 1000; rec.b:= 'b'|| rec.b; INSERT INTO t3 VALUES (rec.a, rec.b); END LOOP; END;
CREATE TABLE t1 (a INT, b VARCHAR(10));

CREATE PROCEDURE p1 AS BEGIN FOR rec1 IN (SELECT a, b FROM t1) LOOP DECLARE CURSOR cur2 IS SELECT a+1000 AS a, 'bb'||b AS b FROM t1 WHERE a=rec1.a AND b=rec1.b; BEGIN SELECT rec1.a, rec1.b; FOR rec2 IN cur2 LOOP SELECT rec2.a, rec2.b; END LOOP; END; END LOOP; FOR rec1 IN (SELECT a,b FROM t1) LOOP FOR rec2 IN (SELECT a+2000 AS a,'bbb'||b AS b FROM t1 WHERE a=rec1.a AND b=rec1.b) LOOP SELECT rec2.a, rec2.b; END LOOP; END LOOP; END;
